snippet: The Rowan County clerk lost another bid on Thursday to delay licensing same-sex marriages.
abstract: United States Appeals Court rejects argument by defense attorneys for Rowan County, Ky, clerk Kim Davis that she should not be forced to issue additional marriage licenses to same-sex couples while her case is pending.
lead_paragraph: The Rowan County clerk lost another bid on Thursday to delay licensing same-sex marriages.

headline.main: Kentucky: Kim Davis Loses Another Appeal on Same-Sex Marriage Licenses
headline.print_headline: Kentucky: Clerk Loses Another Appeal on Same-Sex Marriage Licenses

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
